law.catch_line: The Commission consists of nine members....

section.section: The Commission consists of nine members.
The Secretary shall appoint the members with the approval of the Governor.

text.section: Each member shall have experience and training to deal with the matters that are the responsibilities of the Commission.

section.section: The term of a member is 5 years.
The terms of members are staggered as required by the terms provided for members of the Commission on October 1, 2003.
At the end of a term, a member continues to serve until a successor is appointed and qualifies.
A member who is appointed after a term has begun serves only for the rest of the term and until a successor is appointed and qualifies.
A member may not serve more than 2 terms.

text.section: With the approval of the Governor, the Secretary may remove a member for neglect of duty or other sufficient cause.
